nodes.text: Cha'nagh was a male Flesh Raider who lived on the planet Tython during the time of the Cold War fought between the Galactic Republic and the Sith Empire. Cha'nagh had blue eyes and pink-colored skin, utilized a vibrosword in combat, and wore thick, silver-colored shoulder armor. During the year 3643 BBY, the Flesh Raider was serving with an army formed by the Dark Jedi Bengel Morr, who was leading a campaign against the Jedi Order and Twi'lek Pilgrims. Around the start of the fighting, Cha'nagh was stationed with two Flesh Raider scouts at a small camp in the Tythonian Gnarls region of the planet.
While Cha'nagh was in the Gnarls, an individual affiliated with the Galactic Republic came upon the camp and killed the Flesh Raider.

Cha'nagh appeared in Star Wars: The Old Republic, a 2011 BioWare–LucasArts MMORPG. In the game, the Flesh Raider is a low-level boss in the Gnarls area on Tython, the starting planet for the Jedi Consular and Jedi Knight classes. However, any Republic player class—Jedi Consular, Jedi Knight, Smuggler, or Trooper—can kill Cha'nagh. Since this article was written with the assumption of 100 percent game completion, this article states that Cha'nagh was killed but does not specify an individual. Though not mentioned in-game, the game's character model is explicitly labeled as Male instead of Neutral.
